verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> and <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H8416>Praise<s%> <S%H1747>waiteth<s%> for thee, O <S%H430>God<s%>, in <S%H6726>Sion<s%>: and unto thee shall the <S%H5088>vow<s%> be <S%H7999>performed<s%>.
O thou that <S%H8085>hearest<s%> <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, unto thee shall all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>.
<S%H1697%H5771>Iniquities<s%> <S%H1396>prevail<s%> against me: as for our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, thou shalt purge them <S%H3722>away<s%>.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the man whom thou <S%H977>choosest<s%>, and causest to <S%H7126>approach<s%> unto thee, that he may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H2691>courts<s%>: we shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, even of thy <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

By terrible <S%H3372>things<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> wilt thou <S%H6030>answer<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; who art the <S%H4009>confidence<s%> of all the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and of them that are afar <S%H7350>off<s%> upon the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:
Which by his <S%H3581>strength<s%> setteth <S%H3559>fast<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; being <S%H247>girded<s%> with <S%H1369>power<s%>:
Which <S%H7623>stilleth<s%> the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of their <S%H1530>waves<s%>, and the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of the <S%H3816>people<s%>.

They also that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the uttermost <S%H7099>parts<s%> are <S%H3372>afraid<s%> at thy <S%H226>tokens<s%>: thou makest the <S%H4161>outgoings<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H7442>rejoice<s%>.

Thou <S%H6485>visitest<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7783>waterest<s%> it: thou <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H6238>enrichest<s%> it with the <S%H6388>river<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: thou <S%H3559>preparest<s%> them <S%H1715>corn<s%>, when thou hast so <S%H3559>provided<s%> for it.

Thou <S%H7301>waterest<s%> the <S%H8525>ridges<s%> thereof <S%H7301>abundantly<s%>: thou <S%H5181>settlest<s%> the <S%H1417%H1418>furrows<s%> thereof: thou makest it <S%H4127>soft<s%> with <S%H7241>showers<s%>: thou <S%H1288>blessest<s%> the <S%H6780>springing<s%> thereof.
Thou <S%H5849>crownest<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> with thy <S%H2896>goodness<s%>; and thy <S%H4570>paths<s%> <S%H7491>drop<s%> <S%H1880>fatness<s%>.
They <S%H7491>drop<s%> upon the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: and the little <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H1524>rejoice<s%> on every <S%H2296>side<s%>.

The <S%H3733>pastures<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%>; the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> also are covered <S%H5848>over<s%> with <S%H1250>corn<s%>; they shout for <S%H7321>joy<s%>, they also <S%H7891>sing<s%>.
